./.title: Apache
./.body: Apache Apache HTTP Server 是一个开放源码的网页服务器软件。

docs/压力测试.html.title: 压力测试
docs/压力测试.html.body: 压力测试 执行下面的命令，可以对服务器进行基准测试。 ab -c 100 -n 1000 http://localhost/ 以上例程的输出类似于： This is ApacheBench, Version 2.3 Copyright 1996 Adam Twiss, Zeus Technology Ltd, http://www.zeustech.net/ Licensed to The Apache Software Foundation, http://www.apache.org/ Benchmarking localhost (be patient) Completed 100 requests Completed 200 requests Completed 300 requests Completed 400 requests Completed 500 requests Completed 600 requests Completed 700 requests Completed 800 requests Completed 900 requests Completed 1000 requests Finished 1000 requests Server Software: nginx Server Hostname: localhost Server Port: 80 Document Path: / Document Length: 1358 bytes Concurrency Level: 100 Time taken for tests: 2.845 seconds Complete requests: 1000 Failed requests: 0 Total transferred: 1695000 bytes HTML transferred: 1358000 bytes Requests per second: 351.55 [#/sec] (mean) Time per request: 284.458 [ms] (mean) Time per request: 2.845 [ms] (mean, across all concurrent requests) Transfer rate: 581.90 [Kbytes/sec] received Connection Times (ms) min mean[+/-sd] median max Connect: 0 0 0.3 0 1 Processing: 38 78 7.0 79 93 Waiting: 4 78 7.3 79 93 Total: 38 78 6.9 79 93 Percentage of the requests served within a certain time (ms) 50% 79 66% 80 75% 80 80% 80 90% 81 95% 82 98% 86 99% 91 100% 93 (longest request)
